SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AsteEsperimentiEsiti] ( [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Ky] tinyint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Titolo] varchar(150) NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_UserInsert] int NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_UserUpdate] int NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_UserDelete] int NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Icona] varchar(100) NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Colore] varchar(50) NULL , [AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Ordine] tinyint NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AsteEsperimentiEsiti] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_AsteEsperimentiEsiti PRIMARY KEY ([AsteEsperimentiEsiti_Ky])
